signup.page.title: Sign up
signup.success-page.title: Successfully registered
signup.success-page.description: We have sent you an email with an activation link. Please check your email and click on the link to activate your account.

kyb.welcome-page.title: Welcome to Eccube!
kyb.welcome-page.description:
Before we start, please tell us a little bit about your company and yourself.
Please click the button below to continue.
kyb.user-info-page.title: Your information
kyb.company-page.title: Company details
kyb.mollie-page.title: Mollie connect
kyb.mollie-page.onboarding: We recommend you to complete the onboarding process with Mollie to start accepting payments.
kyb.dashboard.onboarding-status-needs: Please update information to start accept payments.
kyb.dashboard.onboarding-status-review: Your account's information is in review

sidebar.banner-description1: Over 10 years of communication and project management with craftsmen, purchasers, contractors, consultants... on various topics related to facility management.
sidebar.banner-description2: Long payment terms for clients and fast liquidity on the contractor side provide the necessary flexibility for both customers and tradespeople.
sidebar.banner-title3: We support you with processes and templates
sidebar.banner-description3: Extensive standards in the building management sector are an integral part of our workflows.
sidebar.banner-title4: We stand for fair prices and high quality
sidebar.banner-description4: Price transparency and rated tradespeople and service providers not only ensure a balanced market offer, but also fair prices and better quality.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.password: Password must be at least 8 characters long

description.successfully-created-tender: We have sent an email to the selected suppliers. You can view the list of suppliers and other details in the 'Tender details' drawer in the dashboard.
description.successfully-created-tender-draft: The tender has been saved as a draft. You can continue editing via 'Tender details' drawer in the dashboard.

tender-drawer.title: Title
tender-drawer.confirm-delete-content: Are you sure you want to delete this tender?

delete-tender.title: Delete Tender
delete-tender.content: Are you sure you want to delete this tender?

confirm-publish-tender.title: Publish Tender
confirm-publish-tender.content: Are you sure you want to publish this tender? Note that you won't be able to edit it after publishing.
